annoucements.title: Faculty Meeting
annoucements.description: There will be a faculty meeting on Wednesday, February 9th, at 10:00 AM in the conference room. Attendance is mandatory.
annoucements.author: Bob

annoucements.title: Department Seminar Series
annoucements.description: Our department seminar series continues this Friday with a presentation by Dr. Smith on recent advancements in neuroscience. All faculty and students are invited to attend.
annoucements.author: Danny

annoucements.title: Reminder: Course Evaluations
annoucements.description: Faculty are reminded to complete course evaluations for the Fall semester. Please submit your feedback by Friday, February 14th.
annoucements.author: Nick

annoucements.title: New Course Offering
annoucements.description: We are excited to announce a new course offering for the upcoming Spring semester: 'Introduction to Artificial Intelligence.' Please contact the department office for more information.
annoucements.author: Alex
